What makes 34SP.com better than the rest?

Exceptional customer support

We provide the very best technical support available and leave the automated systems and robotic chat to others

We’re convinced you’ll love what we do, which is why we give you a 30-day money-back guarantee

Our managed hosting platform is custom-built for high speeds, rock-solid security, and reliability

    Web hosting FAQs

    How can I build a website with 34SP.com?

    First you will need to purchase a domain name. We offer a huge range of domain name choices with over 200 types! You can search and register via our domain name registration page.

    We have two tools we strongly recommend to start building websites. For simple websites, or beginners, we recommend our Weebly website builder. Weebly is a simple browser based, website building tool that lets you create a website with nothing more than a few clicks of a button. We also provide it for free on our Professional Hosting plan. For more flexibility we recommend WordPress – the popular content management system that runs more than a third of the web. WordPress is also free and we recommend our Managed WordPress Hosting for best results.

    How much does hosting cost?

    Costs for web hosting can vary greatly based on your site needs. Our base packages run from £7.95 to £44.95 per month and serve a variety of requirements. All our prices include VAT, we have no hidden costs, and everything is backed by our 30 day money back guarantee – no questions asked. If you aren’t sure what type of hosting you need, simply contact our sales team and we will be happy to advise you with no commitment.

    Can I transfer my website to you?

    Of course! If you already have a website, we’d love to help you migrate to 34SP.com and make the process as simple as possible. If you would like to migrate your website, we offer a 100% free migration service. We’ll handle everything from advising on what package you need to purchase to also helping you move your website data too.

    Can I host multiple domain names?

    Each of the hosting plans we offer supports a different number of unique websites. Our professional plan supports one main website for example, but our reseller plan allows you to create an unlimited number of websites. We have a lot of different options all tailored for different types of client and requirement. You can browse all our plans on our hosting page, or contact our sales team for more detailed personal help.

    Where are you based?

    We’re based in the Northern Quarter of Manchester in the United Kingdom. Our support team is trained and operated completely in-house. We’re open from 8 am until 8 pm every day of the week and offer support over email, telephone and Slack during those hours. We mainly focus on UK website hosting, but do have happy customers from all corners of the globe. If you’re outside the UK we’d love to host your website, but do compare our support hours to your own requirements first.

    How will you help support my website?

    First and foremost we will ensure your website is up, online and running at all times. We monitor our servers and network around the clock 365 days a year. Our engineering team is on call 24/7 to respond to any fault, at any time.

    If your site ever seems slow or sluggish, our support team will find out what’s causing the issue and suggest a fix. If you ever have any security concerns or issues, we’ve got your back too. If you have any issues related to your hosting service, we’re on hand to help.

    The building and maintenance of your website is your responsibility. We’re always happy to give pointers, tips, suggestions and simple advice where we can – but if you’re struggling with a complex piece of PHP code we probably cannot assist.

    Read more

    Ready to get started?

    Are you ready for outstanding service and impeccable hosting?

    We’re so convinced you’ll love what we do, we’ll even give you a rolling 30-day money-back guarantee. If you ever decide you want to leave us you can close your account and we’ll refund the last 30 days of your hosting fees.

    Get in touch today, so we can learn more about your business
    and help you achieve your online ambitions.
